content.new:
Holding down Control and selecting objects in any mode should select all objects and allow users to manipulate all of them at once. 

Currently, for the model builder's align feature, users must be in Select mode to make multiple selections to align. A
content.old: Holding down Control and selecting objects in any mode should select all objects and allow users to manipulate all of them at once. Currently, for the model builder's align feature, users must be in Select mode to make multiple selections to align. Acros

issue.title: Allow selection of multiple objects at once
